sqlMap.select: SELECT /* CSPNBK722QRecInterestSelect */ D1.SLIP_DEAL_DT , D1.SLIP_SLN , D1.PET_DH , D1.AM * ( DECODE( D1.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD, 'D', -1, 1 ) ) AS AM , D1.RMK FROM TBCSPNBK302L D1 WHERE D1.SLIP_DEAL_DT = #settleYr# || '1231' AND ( ( D1.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD = '430105' AND D1.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD = '0' ) OR ( D1.DS_MNST_CLU_CD = '430105' AND D1.DS_TAX_SITM_CD = '0' ) )

SELECT /* CSPNBK722QAccIntByLendKndCdSelect */ SUM( CASE WHEN D6.END_CALC_DT = #settleYr# || '1231' THEN FLOOR(D6.LEND_BL * D6.ITR * ( (TO_DATE(END_CALC_DT, 'YYYYMMDD')+1) - TO_DATE(STA_CALC_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') ) / 365 / 100) ELSE FLOOR(D6.LEND_BL * D6.ITR * ( TO_DATE(END_CALC_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(STA_CALC_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') ) / 365 / 100) END ) AS INT FROM ( SELECT D4.LEND_KND_CD , D4.MOUI_NO , D4.LEND_AM , D4.LEND_DT , D4.LEND_BL , D4.FNL_RPM_DT , D4.EXPR_DT , D4.STA_DT , D4.END_DT , D4.PENAL_YN , ( CASE WHEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT <= D4.STA_DT AND D5.END_ITR_APC_DT < D4.END_DT THEN D4.STA_DT WHEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT <= D4.STA_DT AND D5.END_ITR_APC_DT <= D4.END_DT THEN D4.STA_DT WHEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT >= D4.STA_DT AND D5.END_ITR_APC_DT < D4.END_DT THEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT WHEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT >= D4.STA_DT AND D5.END_ITR_APC_DT >= D4.END_DT THEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT END ) AS STA_CALC_DT , ( CASE WHEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT <= D4.STA_DT AND D5.END_ITR_APC_DT < D4.END_DT THEN D5.END_ITR_APC_DT WHEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT <= D4.STA_DT AND D5.END_ITR_APC_DT <= D4.END_DT THEN D4.END_DT WHEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT >= D4.STA_DT AND D5.END_ITR_APC_DT < D4.END_DT THEN D5.END_ITR_APC_DT WHEN D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT >= D4.STA_DT AND D5.END_ITR_APC_DT >= D4.END_DT THEN D4.END_DT END ) AS END_CALC_DT , ( CASE WHEN D4.PENAL_YN = 'N' THEN D5.LEND_ITR ELSE D5.ARR_ITR ENd ) AS ITR FROM ( SELECT D1.LEND_KND_CD , D1.MOUI_NO , D1.LEND_AM , D1.LEND_DT , D1.LEND_BL , D2.FNL_RPM_DT , D1.EXPR_DT , ( CASE WHEN D2.FNL_RPM_DT <= D1.EXPR_DT AND D1.EXPR_DT <= #settleYr# || '1231' THEN D2.FNL_RPM_DT WHEN D2.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr# || '1231' AND #settleYr# || '1231' <= D1.EXPR_DT THEN D2.FNL_RPM_DT WHEN D1.EXPR_DT <= D2.FNL_RPM_DT AND D2.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr# || '1231' THEN D2.FNL_RPM_DT END ) AS STA_DT , ( CASE WHEN D2.FNL_RPM_DT <= D1.EXPR_DT AND D1.EXPR_DT <= #settleYr# || '1231' THEN #settleYr# || '1231' WHEN D2.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr# || '1231' AND '2014' || '1231' <= D1.EXPR_DT THEN #settleYr# || '1231' WHEN D1.EXPR_DT <= D2.FNL_RPM_DT AND D2.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr# || '1231' THEN #settleYr# || '1231' END ) AS END_DT , ( CASE WHEN D2.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr# || '1231' AND #settleYr# || '1231' <= D1.EXPR_DT THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END ) AS PENAL_YN FROM TBCSPNBK203D D1 , TBCSPNBK202M D2 WHERE D1.LEND_KND_CD = D2.LEND_KND_CD AND D1.MOUI_NO = D2.MOUI_NO AND D1.LEND_KND_CD = #lendKndCd# AND D1.LEND_BL > 0 AND D1.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr# || '1231' ) D4 , ( SELECT D3.LEND_KND_CD , D3.STA_ITR_APC_DT , D3.END_ITR_APC_DT , D4.LEND_ITR , D4.ARR_ITR FROM ( SELECT D1.ITR_APC_DT AS STA_ITR_APC_DT , D1.LEND_KND_CD , MIN(D2.ITR_APC_DT) AS END_ITR_APC_DT FROM TBCSPNBK201M D1 , TBCSPNBK201M D2 WHERE D1.LEND_KND_CD = D2.LEND_KND_CD AND D1.ITR_APC_DT < D2.ITR_APC_DT GROUP BY D1.ITR_APC_DT, D1.LEND_KND_CD ) D3 , TBCSPNBK201M D4 WHERE D3.STA_ITR_APC_DT = D4.ITR_APC_DT AND D3.LEND_KND_CD = D4.LEND_KND_CD
UNION ALL
SELECT D2.LEND_KND_CD , D2.ITR_APC_DT AS STA_ITR_APC_DT , #settleYr# || '1231' AS END_ITR_APC_DT , D2.LEND_ITR , D2.ARR_ITR FROM TBCSPNBK201M D2 WHERE ( D2.ITR_APC_DT, D2.LEND_KND_CD ) IN ( SELECT MAX(D1.ITR_APC_DT) AS ITR_APC_DT , D1.LEND_KND_CD FROM TBCSPNBK201M D1 GROUP BY D1.LEND_KND_CD ) ) D5 WHERE D4.LEND_KND_CD = D5.LEND_KND_CD AND D4.STA_DT <= D5.END_ITR_APC_DT AND D4.END_DT >= D5.STA_ITR_APC_DT ) D6
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO /* CSPNBK722QBsBackBySettleYrInsert */ TBCSPNBK502M ( DEAL_DT , MNST_CLU_CD , TAX_SITM_CD , AM , CRDT_AGG_AM , CRDT_NOC , DS_AGG_AM , DS_NOC , YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM , YRLY_CRDT_NOC , YRLY_DS_AGG_AM , YRLY_DS_NOC , CLSNG_YN , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , FRT_REGI_DH , FNL_MDF_DH ) SELECT #settleYr# || #settleMd# AS DEAL_DT , D1.MNST_CLU_CD , D1.TAX_SITM_CD , D1.AM , D1.CRDT_AGG_AM , D1.CRDT_NOC , D1.DS_AGG_AM , D1.DS_NOC , D1.YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM , D1.YRLY_CRDT_NOC , D1.YRLY_DS_AGG_AM , D1.YRLY_DS_NOC , 'Y' AS CLSNG_YN , #USR_ID# AS FRT_USR_ID , #USR_ID# AS FNL_USR_ID , #DPT_CD# AS FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , #MNU_ID# AS FNL_MNU_ID , SYSDATE AS FRT_REGI_DH , SYSDATE AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM TBCSPNBK502M D1 WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* CSPNBK722QPreSettleUnDividAmSelect */ SUM((CASE WHEN SUBSTR(D1.MNST_CLU_CD, 1, 1) = '4' THEN AM ELSE 0 END)) - SUM((CASE WHEN SUBSTR(D1.MNST_CLU_CD, 1, 1) = '5' THEN AM ELSE 0 END)) AS UNDIVID_AM FROM TBCSPNBK502M D1 WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = #dealDt#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /* CSPNBK722QProfitLostAmInitUpdate */ TBCSPNBK502M D1 SET D1.AM = 0 , D1.CRDT_AGG_AM = 0 , D1.CRDT_NOC = D1.CRDT_NOC + 1 , D1.DS_AGG_AM = 0 , D1.DS_NOC = D1.DS_NOC + 1 , D1.YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM = 0 , D1.YRLY_CRDT_NOC = D1.YRLY_CRDT_NOC + 1 , D1.YRLY_DS_AGG_AM = 0 , D1.YRLY_DS_NOC = D1.YRLY_DS_NOC + 1 , D1.FNL_USR_ID = #USR_ID# , D1.FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# , D1.FNL_MNU_ID = #MNU_ID# , D1.FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = #dealDt# AND (D1.MNST_CLU_CD LIKE '4%' OR D1.MNST_CLU_CD LIKE '5%')

UPDATE /* CSPNBK722QSettleBsInitUpdate */ TBCSPNBK502M D1 SET AM = ( SELECT D2.AM FROM TBCSPNBK502M D2 WHERE D2.DEAL_DT = #settleYr# || '1301' AND D2.MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) , D1.YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM = 0 , D1.YRLY_CRDT_NOC = 0 , D1.YRLY_DS_AGG_AM = 0 , D1.YRLY_DS_NOC = 0 , D1.FNL_USR_ID = #USR_ID# , D1.FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD = #DPT_CD# , D1.FNL_MNU_ID = #MNU_ID# , D1.FNL_MDF_DH = SYSDATE WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
sqlMap.select: WITH /* CSPNBK722RecInterestSelect */ MAX_DEAL_DT AS ( SELECT MAX(D2.DEAL_DT) AS DEAL_DT FROM TBCSPNBK502M D2 WHERE D2.DEAL_DT < #settleYr# || '1301' AND D2.MNST_CLU_CD = '116202' AND D2.TAX_SITM_CD = '0' ) SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN D1.DEAL_DT = ( SELECT DEAL_DT FROM MAX_DEAL_DT ) THEN D1.AM ELSE 0 END ) - SUM( CASE WHEN D1.DEAL_DT = #settleYr# || '1301' THEN D1.AM ELSE 0 END ) AS d FROM TBCSPNBK502M D1 WHERE D1.MNST_CLU_CD = '116202' AND D1.TAX_SITM_CD = '0'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /* CSPNBK722QBsMsCYrlyCrdt234BySettleYrUpdate */ TBCSPNBK502M D1 SET D1.AM = D1.AM + NVL(( SELECT SUM(D2.AM) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ), 0) , ( YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM, YRLY_CRDT_NOC ) = ( SELECT SUM(D2.AM), COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( D1.MNST_CLU_CD, D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) IN ( SELECT D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD , D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND SUBSTR(D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD, 1, 1 ) IN ( '2', '3', '4') GROUP BY D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD, D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD )

UPDATE /* CSPNBK722QBsMsCYrlyCrdt15BySettleYrUpdate */ TBCSPNBK502M D1 SET D1.AM = D1.AM - NVL(( SELECT SUM(D2.AM) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ), 0) , ( YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM, YRLY_CRDT_NOC ) = ( SELECT SUM(D2.AM), COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( D1.MNST_CLU_CD, D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) IN ( SELECT D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD , D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND SUBSTR(D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD, 1, 1 ) IN ( '1', '5') GROUP BY D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD, D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD )

UPDATE /* CSPNBK722QBsMsCYrlyDsBySettleYrUpdate */ TBCSPNBK502M D1 SET D1.AM = D1.AM + NVL(( SELECT SUM(D2.AM) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ), 0) , ( YRLY_DS_AGG_AM, YRLY_DS_NOC ) = ( SELECT SUM(D2.AM), COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' AND D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( D1.MNST_CLU_CD, D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) IN ( SELECT D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD , D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'C' GROUP BY D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD, D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD )

UPDATE /* CSPNBK722QBsMsDYrlyDs15BySettleYrUpdate */ TBCSPNBK502M D1 SET D1.AM = D1.AM + NVL(( SELECT SUM(D2.AM) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' AND D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ), 0) , ( YRLY_DS_AGG_AM, YRLY_DS_NOC ) = ( SELECT SUM(D2.AM), COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' AND D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( D1.MNST_CLU_CD, D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) IN ( SELECT D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD , D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' AND SUBSTR(D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD, 1, 1 ) IN ( '1', '5') GROUP BY D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD, D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD )

UPDATE /* CSPNBK722QBsMsDYrlyDs234BySettleYrUpdate */ TBCSPNBK502M D1 SET D1.AM = D1.AM - NVL(( SELECT SUM(D2.AM) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' AND D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ), 0) , ( YRLY_DS_AGG_AM, YRLY_DS_NOC ) = ( SELECT SUM(D2.AM), COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' AND D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( D1.MNST_CLU_CD, D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) IN ( SELECT D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD , D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' AND SUBSTR(D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD, 1, 1 ) IN ( '2', '3', '4') GROUP BY D2.DS_MNST_CLU_CD, D2.DS_TAX_SITM_CD )

UPDATE /* CSPNBK722QBsMsDYrlyCrdtBySettleYrUpdate */ TBCSPNBK502M D1 SET D1.AM = D1.AM - NVL(( SELECT SUM(D2.AM) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' AND D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ), 0) , ( YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM, YRLY_CRDT_NOC ) = ( SELECT SUM(D2.AM), COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' AND D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD = D1.MNST_CLU_CD AND D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD = D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) WHERE D1.DEAL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( D1.MNST_CLU_CD, D1.TAX_SITM_CD ) IN ( SELECT D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD , D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD FROM TBCSPNBK301M D2 WHERE D2.SMB_DEAL_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '%' AND D2.CNL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DEPTS_PMT_DVSN_CD = 'D' GROUP BY D2.CRDT_MNST_CLU_CD, D2.CRDT_TAX_SITM_CD )
sqlMap.select: /* * 잔액이 있는 출자자들의 리스트 */ SELECT A.MOUI_NO, CASE B.MOUI_DVSN_CD WHEN '0' THEN C.USR_NAM ELSE B.OGNZ_NM END NAME, A.DEAL_AF_LEDG_BL AS INV_BL FROM TBCSPNBK102L A ,TBCSPNBK001M B , TBDCMACM001M C WHERE (A.MOUI_NO, A.INV_DEAL_DT, A.INV_DEAL_SLN) IN ( SELECT A.MOUI_NO, A.INV_DEAL_DT,MAX(INV_DEAL_SLN) FROM TBCSPNBK102L A WHERE (A.MOUI_NO, A.INV_DEAL_DT) IN ( SELECT A.MOUI_NO,MAX(B.INV_DEAL_DT) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK102L B WHERE B.INV_DEAL_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' AND A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO GROUP BY A.MOUI_NO ) GROUP BY A.MOUI_NO, A.INV_DEAL_DT ) AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND B.CNB (+)= C.CNB AND A.DEAL_AF_LEDG_BL > 0 AND B.SCS_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.MOUI_NO

/* * 출자현황 첫줄 : 100 만원미만 */ SELECT '100만원 미만' AS NM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK101M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.INV_BL < 1000000 AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND ( D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '00' OR D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '01' OR D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '02' OR D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '03' OR D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '04' ) ) AS CNT1, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK101M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.INV_BL < 1000000 AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '05' ) AS CNT2, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK101M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.INV_BL < 1000000 AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '06' ) AS CNT3, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK101M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.INV_BL < 1000000 AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '07' ) AS CNT4, ( SELECT A.P_CNT - B.P_CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) P_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK101M B, TBDCMACM001M C WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.INV_BL < 1000000 ) A, ( SELECT COUNT(*) P_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK101M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.INV_BL < 1000000 AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 IN ('00','01','02','03','04','05','06','07') ) B ) AS CNT5, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK101M B WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '1' AND B.INV_BL < 1000000) AS CNT6, ( SELECT A.P_CNT + B.M_CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) P_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK101M B, TBDCMACM001M C /* * 잔액이 있는 대출자들의 리스트 * 대출금 잔액장 LEND_KND_CD :1 대출 2: 임차대출 */ SELECT A.MOUI_NO AS MOUI_NO, CASE B.MOUI_DVSN_CD WHEN '0' THEN NVL(C.USR_NAM,'') ELSE NVL(B.OGNZ_NM,'') END AS USR_NAME, A.LEND_BL AS LEND_BL FROM TBCSPNBK202M A , TBCSPNBK001M B , TBDCMACM001M C WHERE A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND B.CNB (+)= C.CNB AND A.LEND_BL > 0 AND B.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# ORDER BY A.MOUI_NO

35000000 AND B.LEND_BL < 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '07' ) AS CNT4, ( SELECT A.P_CNT - B.P_CNT FROM ( SELECT 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# ) A , ( SELECT COUNT(*) P_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.LEND_BL >= 35000000 AND B.LEND_BL < 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 IN ('00','01','02','03','04','05','06','07') ) B ) AS CNT5, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '1' AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND B.LEND_BL >= 35000000 AND B.LEND_BL < 40000000 ) AS CNT6, ( SELECT A.P_CNT + B.M_CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) P_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B, TBDCMACM001M C WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.LEND_BL >= 35000000 AND B.LEND_BL < 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# ) A, ( SELECT COUNT(*) M_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '1' AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND B.LEND_BL >= 35000000 AND B.LEND_BL < 40000000 ) B ) AS CNT7 FROM DUAL UNION ALL /* * 출자현황 10줄 : 4000 만원 이상 */ SELECT '4,000만원 이상' AS NM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '05' ) AS CNT2, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.LEND_BL >= 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '06' ) AS CNT3, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.LEND_BL >= 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 = '07' ) AS CNT4, ( SELECT A.P_CNT - B.P_CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) P_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B, TBDCMACM001M C WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.LEND_BL >= 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# ) A , ( SELECT COUNT(*) P_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B, TBDCMACM001M C, TBDCMACM013C D WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.LEND_BL >= 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND D.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000173' AND D.CD = C.RANK_CD AND D.USR_DFN_TXT_1 IN ('00','01','02','03','04','05','06','07') ) B ) AS CNT5, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '1' AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND B.LEND_BL >= 40000000 ) AS CNT6, ( SELECT A.P_CNT + B.M_CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) P_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B, TBDCMACM001M C WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB AND B.LEND_BL >= 40000000 AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# ) A, ( SELECT COUNT(*) M_CNT FROM TBCSPNBK001M A, TBCSPNBK202M B WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '1' AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND B.LEND_BL >= 40000000 ) B )AS CNT7 FROM DUAL

SELECT A.P_CNT + B.M_CNT AS CNT , A.LEND_BL + B.LEND_BL AS AMT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS P_CNT , SUM(B.LEND_BL ) AS LEND_BL FROM TBCSPNBK001M A , TBCSPNBK202M B , TBDCMACM001M C WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '0' AND A.CNB = C.CNB ) A, ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS M_CNT , NVL(SUM(B.LEND_BL ), 0) AS LEND_BL FROM TBCSPNBK001M A , TBCSPNBK202M B WHERE A.SCS_YN = 'N' AND B.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.MOUI_DVSN_CD = '1' ) B

/* * 미수이자 계산 QUERY */ SELECT A.MOUI_NO AS MOUI_NO, C.USR_NAM AS USR_NAM, B.CNB AS CNB, D.DPT_NM AS DPT_NM, A.LEND_DT AS LEND_DT, A.LEND_AM AS LEND_AM, A.LEND_BL AS LEND_BL, A.SS_DATE AS SS_DATE, A.EE_DATE AS EE_DATE, A.R_RATE AS R_RATE, CASE WHEN A.EE_DATE = #settleYr#||'1231' THEN TO_DATE(A.EE_DATE)- TO_DATE(A.SS_DATE)+1 ELSE TO_DATE(A.EE_DATE) - TO_DATE(A.SS_DATE) END AS ILSU, CASE WHEN A.EE_DATE = #settleYr#||'1231' THEN FLOOR(A.LEND_BL*A.R_RATE* (TO_DATE(A.EE_DATE) - TO_DATE(A.SS_DATE) + 1)/365/100) ELSE FLOOR(A.LEND_BL*A.R_RATE*(TO_DATE(A.EE_DATE) - TO_DATE(A.EE_DATE))/365/100) END AS INTER, A.T_PENAL_YN AS T_PENAL_YN FROM ( SELECT A.MOUI_NO AS MOUI_NO, A.LEND_KND_CD AS LN_KIND, A.LEND_DT AS LEND_DT, A.LEND_AM AS LEND_AM, A.LEND_BL AS LEND_BL, CASE WHEN B.S_DATE <= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE < A.T_END_DATE THEN A.T_STA_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE <= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE >= A.T_END_DATE THEN A.T_STA_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE < A.T_END_DATE THEN B.S_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE >= A.T_END_DATE THEN B.S_DATE ELSE 'ERROR---------------------------------------------------------------' END AS SS_DATE, CASE WHEN B.S_DATE <= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE < A.T_END_DATE THEN B.E_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE <= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE >= A.T_END_DATE THEN A.T_END_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE < A.T_END_DATE THEN B.E_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE >= A.T_END_DATE THEN A.T_END_DATE ELSE 'ERROR---------------------------------------------------------------' END AS EE_DATE, CASE WHEN A.T_PENAL_YN = 'N' THEN B.LEND_ITR WHEN A.T_PENAL_YN = 'Y' THEN B.ARR_ITR END AS R_RATE, A.T_PENAL_YN AS T_PENAL_YN FROM ( SELECT A.LEND_KND_CD AS LEND_KND_CD, A.MOUI_NO AS MOUI_NO, A.LEND_AM AS LEND_AM, A.LEND_DT AS LEND_DT, A.LEND_BL AS LEND_BL, CASE WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= A.EXPR_DT AND A.EXPR_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' THEN B.FNL_RPM_DT WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' AND #settleYr#||'1231' <= A.EXPR_DT THEN B.FNL_RPM_DT WHEN A.EXPR_DT <= B.FNL_RPM_DT AND B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' THEN B.FNL_RPM_DT ELSE 'ERROR---------------------------------------------------------------' END AS T_STA_DATE, CASE WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= A.EXPR_DT AND A.EXPR_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' THEN #settleYr#||'1231' WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' AND #settleYr#||'1231' <= A.EXPR_DT THEN #settleYr#||'1231' WHEN A.EXPR_DT <= B.FNL_RPM_DT AND B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' THEN #settleYr#||'1231' ELSE 'ERROR---------------------------------------------------------------' END AS T_END_DATE, CASE WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' AND #settleYr#||'1231' <= A.EXPR_DT THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS T_PENAL_YN FROM TBCSPNBK203D A, TBCSPNBK202M B WHERE A.LEND_KND_CD = B.LEND_KND_CD AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.LEND_BL > 0 AND A.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND A.CNL_YN= 'N' AND B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' ) A, ( SELECT A.ITR_APC_DT AS S_DATE , A.LEND_KND_CD AS LEND_KND_CD , MIN(B.ITR_APC_DT) AS E_DATE , A.LEND_ITR AS LEND_ITR , A.ARR_ITR AS ARR_ITR FROM TBCSPNBK201M A, TBCSPNBK201M B WHERE A.ITR_APC_DT < B.ITR_APC_DT AND A.LEND_KND_CD = B.LEND_KND_CD GROUP BY A.ITR_APC_DT, A.LEND_KND_CD, A.LEND_ITR, A.ARR_ITR UNION SELECT B.ITR_APC_DT AS S_DATE , B.LEND_KND_CD AS LEND_KND_CD , #settleYr#||'1231' AS E_DATE , B.LEND_ITR AS LEND_ITR , B.ARR_ITR AS ARR_ITR FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.ITR_APC_DT) AS ITR_APC_DT , A.LEND_KND_CD AS LEND_KND_CD FROM TBCSPNBK201M A, TBCSPNBK201M B WHERE A.LEND_KND_CD = B.LEND_KND_CD GROUP BY A.LEND_KND_CD ) A, TBCSPNBK201M B WHERE A.ITR_APC_DT = B.ITR_APC_DT AND A.LEND_KND_CD = B.LEND_KND_CD ) B WHERE B.E_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND A.T_END_DATE >= B.S_DATE AND B.LEND_KND_CD = A.LEND_KND_CD ) A , TBCSPNBK001M B , TBDCMACM001M C , TBDCMACM002M D WHERE A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND B.CNB = C.CNB AND C.DPT_CD = D.DPT_CD ORDER BY A.MOUI_NO

WITH /* CSPNBK722QSelectReportList7Sum */ STA_DATA AS ( SELECT A.MOUI_NO AS MOUI_NO, A.LEND_KND_CD AS LN_KIND, A.LEND_DT AS LEND_DT, A.LEND_AM AS LEND_AM, A.LEND_BL AS LEND_BL, CASE WHEN B.S_DATE <= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE < A.T_END_DATE THEN A.T_STA_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE <= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE >= A.T_END_DATE THEN A.T_STA_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE < A.T_END_DATE THEN B.S_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE >= A.T_END_DATE THEN B.S_DATE ELSE 'ERROR---------------------------------------------------------------' END AS SS_DATE, CASE WHEN B.S_DATE <= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE < A.T_END_DATE THEN B.E_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE <= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE >= A.T_END_DATE THEN A.T_END_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE < A.T_END_DATE THEN B.E_DATE WHEN B.S_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND B.E_DATE >= A.T_END_DATE THEN A.T_END_DATE ELSE 'ERROR---------------------------------------------------------------' END AS EE_DATE, CASE WHEN A.T_PENAL_YN = 'N' THEN B.LEND_ITR WHEN A.T_PENAL_YN = 'Y' THEN B.ARR_ITR END AS R_RATE, A.T_PENAL_YN AS T_PENAL_YN FROM ( SELECT A.LEND_KND_CD AS LEND_KND_CD, A.MOUI_NO AS MOUI_NO, A.LEND_AM AS LEND_AM, A.LEND_DT AS LEND_DT, A.LEND_BL AS LEND_BL, CASE WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= A.EXPR_DT AND A.EXPR_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' THEN B.FNL_RPM_DT WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' AND #settleYr#||'1231' <= A.EXPR_DT THEN B.FNL_RPM_DT WHEN A.EXPR_DT <= B.FNL_RPM_DT AND B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' THEN B.FNL_RPM_DT ELSE 'ERROR---------------------------------------------------------------' END AS T_STA_DATE, CASE WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= A.EXPR_DT AND A.EXPR_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' THEN #settleYr#||'1231' WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' AND #settleYr#||'1231' <= A.EXPR_DT THEN #settleYr#||'1231' WHEN A.EXPR_DT <= B.FNL_RPM_DT AND B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' THEN #settleYr#||'1231' ELSE 'ERROR---------------------------------------------------------------' END AS T_END_DATE, CASE WHEN B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' AND #settleYr#||'1231' <= A.EXPR_DT THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS T_PENAL_YN FROM TBCSPNBK203D A, TBCSPNBK202M B WHERE A.LEND_KND_CD = B.LEND_KND_CD AND A.MOUI_NO = B.MOUI_NO AND A.LEND_BL > 0 AND A.LEND_KND_CD = #LEND_KND_CD# AND A.CNL_YN= 'N' AND B.FNL_RPM_DT <= #settleYr#||'1231' ) A, ( SELECT A.ITR_APC_DT AS S_DATE , A.LEND_KND_CD AS LEND_KND_CD , MIN(B.ITR_APC_DT) AS E_DATE , A.LEND_ITR AS LEND_ITR , A.ARR_ITR AS ARR_ITR FROM TBCSPNBK201M A, TBCSPNBK201M B WHERE A.ITR_APC_DT < B.ITR_APC_DT AND A.LEND_KND_CD = B.LEND_KND_CD GROUP BY A.ITR_APC_DT, A.LEND_KND_CD, A.LEND_ITR, A.ARR_ITR UNION SELECT B.ITR_APC_DT AS S_DATE , B.LEND_KND_CD AS LEND_KND_CD , #settleYr#||'1231' AS E_DATE , B.LEND_ITR AS LEND_ITR , B.ARR_ITR AS ARR_ITR FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.ITR_APC_DT) AS ITR_APC_DT , A.LEND_KND_CD AS LEND_KND_CD FROM TBCSPNBK201M A, TBCSPNBK201M B WHERE A.LEND_KND_CD = B.LEND_KND_CD GROUP BY A.LEND_KND_CD ) A, TBCSPNBK201M B WHERE A.ITR_APC_DT = B.ITR_APC_DT AND A.LEND_KND_CD = B.LEND_KND_CD ) B WHERE B.E_DATE >= A.T_STA_DATE AND A.T_END_DATE >= B.S_DATE AND B.LEND_KND_CD = A.LEND_KND_CD ) SELECT '합계' AS MOUI_NO, COUNT(MOUI_NO) AS TOT_CNT, SUM(A.LEND_AM) AS LEND_AM_SUM, SUM(A.LEND_BL) AS LEND_BL_SUM, SUM( CASE WHEN A.EE_DATE = #settleYr#||'1231' THEN FLOOR(A.LEND_BL*A.R_RATE* (TO_DATE(A.EE_DATE) - TO_DATE(A.SS_DATE) + 1)/365/100) ELSE FLOOR(A.LEND_BL*A.R_RATE*(TO_DATE(A.EE_DATE) - TO_DATE(A.EE_DATE))/365/100) END ) AS INTER_SUM FROM STA_DATA A

SELECT A.MNST_CLU_CD , A.ACCT_NM , B.AM FROM TBCSPNBK501M A , ( SELECT MNST_CLU_CD , SUM(AM) AS AM FROM TBCSPNBK502M WHERE DEAL_DT = #settleYr#||'1231' GROUP BY MNST_CLU_CD ) B WHERE A.MNST_CLU_CD = B.MNST_CLU_CD AND A.TAX_SITM_CD = '0' AND SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD, LENGTH(A.MNST_CLU_CD), 1) != '0' AND B.AM <> 0 AND SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD, 0, 1) = '1'

SELECT A.MNST_CLU_CD , A.ACCT_NM , B.AM FROM TBCSPNBK501M A , ( SELECT MNST_CLU_CD , SUM(AM) AS AM FROM TBCSPNBK502M WHERE DEAL_DT = #settleYr#||'1231' GROUP BY MNST_CLU_CD ) B WHERE A.MNST_CLU_CD = B.MNST_CLU_CD AND A.TAX_SITM_CD = '0' AND SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD, LENGTH(A.MNST_CLU_CD), 1) != '0' AND B.AM <> 0 AND ( SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD,0, 1) = '2' OR SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD,0, 1) = '3' )

SELECT A.MNST_CLU_CD , A.ACCT_NM , B.AM FROM TBCSPNBK501M A , ( SELECT MNST_CLU_CD , SUM(AM) AM FROM TBCSPNBK502M WHERE DEAL_DT = #settleYr#||'1231' GROUP BY MNST_CLU_CD ) B WHERE A.MNST_CLU_CD = B.MNST_CLU_CD AND A.TAX_SITM_CD = '0' AND SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD, LENGTH(A.MNST_CLU_CD), 1) != '0' AND B.AM <> 0 AND SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD, 0, 1) = '5'

SELECT A.MNST_CLU_CD , A.ACCT_NM , B.AM FROM TBCSPNBK501M A , ( SELECT MNST_CLU_CD , SUM(AM) AM FROM TBCSPNBK502M WHERE DEAL_DT = #settleYr#||'1231' GROUP BY MNST_CLU_CD ) B WHERE A.MNST_CLU_CD = B.MNST_CLU_CD AND A.TAX_SITM_CD = '0' AND SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD, LENGTH(A.MNST_CLU_CD), 1) != '0' AND B.AM <> 0 AND SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD, 0, 1) = '4'

SELECT CASE SUBSTR(B.MNST_CLU_CD, 0, 1) WHEN '1' THEN B.AM ELSE CASE SUBSTR(B.MNST_CLU_CD, 0, 1) WHEN '5' THEN B.AM ELSE 0 END END D_AM, B.YRLY_DS_AGG_AM YRLY_DS_AGG_AM, A.ACCT_NM BS_NAME, B.YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM, CASE SUBSTR(B.MNST_CLU_CD, 0, 1) WHEN '2' THEN B.AM ELSE CASE SUBSTR(B.MNST_CLU_CD, 0, 1) WHEN '3' THEN B.AM ELSE CASE SUBSTR(B.MNST_CLU_CD, 0, 1) WHEN '4' THEN B.AM ELSE 0 END END END C_AM FROM TBCSPNBK501M A , ( SELECT MNST_CLU_CD , SUM(AM) AM , SUM(YRLY_DS_AGG_AM) YRLY_DS_AGG_AM , SUM(YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM) YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM FROM TBCSPNBK502M WHERE DEAL_DT = #settleYr#||'1231' GROUP BY MNST_CLU_CD ) B WHERE A.MNST_CLU_CD = B.MNST_CLU_CD AND A.TAX_SITM_CD = '0' AND SUBSTR(A.MNST_CLU_CD, LENGTH(A.MNST_CLU_CD), 1) <> '0' AND ( B.AM <> 0 OR B.YRLY_CRDT_AGG_AM <> 0 OR B.YRLY_DS_AGG_AM <> 0 ) ORDER BY A.MNST_CLU_CD
